scripts.install_all: npm install && cd cordova && cordova platform add android && cordova plugin add wifiwizard && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-device-motion && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-powermanagement && cd ..
scripts.cordova: cd cordova && rm -r www && cd .. && ng build --prod --build-optimizer --bh . --output-hashing none --output-path cordova/www/
scripts.cordova-run: npm run cordova && cd cordova && cordova run android
scripts.cordova-build: npm run cordova && cd cordova && cordova build android --release
scripts.cordova-debug: npm run cordova && cd cordova && cordova build android --debug
scripts.cordova-s-build: npm run cordova-build && cd cordova/platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore my-release-key.keystore android-release-unsigned.apk alias_name && zipalign -v 4 android-release-unsigned.apk android.apk && rm android-release-unsigned.apk
